title: DataflowEvent
description: The envelope for events on in the dataflow streams.

id.title: ID
id.description: A unique identifier that for the event.

tid.title: Tenant ID
tid.description: The ID of the tenant this event belongs to.

sid.title: Source ID
sid.description: The ID of the source that generated this event.

jid.title: Job ID
jid.description: The ID of the job that generated this event.

bid.title: Batch ID
bid.description: The ID of the batch (run of a job) that generated this event.

rid.title: Record ID
rid.description: A value that uniquely represents the record most relevent to the event.

rids.title: Record IDs
rids.description: The RID value for each record involved in this event.

cid.title: Correlation ID
cid.description: A value used to track the event's movement through the system and to assign causality.

m.title: Metadata
m.description: Metadata to be transferred with the event.

enr.title: Enriched Data
enr.description: The enriched payload of this data point

trc.title: Trace
trc.description: Trace information used for monitoring latency. This will only be populated on a fraction of events.

Trace.description: A trace records stats for a step that an event has gone through.

ts.title: Timestamp
ts.description: Timestamp indicating when the step started.

d.title: Duration
d.description: The time it took to complete the step, in nanoseconds.

Heartbeat.description: A tracer used for monitoring latency and providing a keep-alive heartbeat for long-running jobs.
